data.title: Weekend Uttaranchal
data.qoute: ...Explore Nainital and Jim Corbett National Park

overview.title: Nainital (…Peachy and Decency, Sign A Peace Treaty):
overview.subtitle: Beautiful mountain, crystal-clear lakes, famous temples and greenery all over is Nainital for you. Popularly known as the City of Lakes. Enveloped in a thick foil of nature, accentuated by the scent of the flowering blossoms blending miraculously in the crisp fresh air, Nainital is truly the treasure trove of Kumano. It is among the most visited hill station of the North India since British period.

overview.title: Jim Corbett National Park (…Hear Nature’s Roar):
overview.subtitle: Jim Corbett National Park can be befittingly called the paradise of Tigers with a large population of Tigers in its breathtaking landscaped. Named after the legendary tiger hunter turned naturalist Jim Corbett, the proud destinations ‘Jim Corbett National Park’ was the first national park of India, which was established in 1936 in the Uttarakhand.

data.route: Delhi – Nainital - Jim Corbett National Park - Delhi
data.nightStay: Nainital (2 Nights), Corbett National Park (1 Night)

description.title: Day 1 Pickup from Delhi Railway Station/Airport (325 Kms : 8Hrs. Travelling to Nainital)

subtitles.activities: Arrival in Nainital and enjoy a quick and hassle-free check-in at Hotel.
Evening free to enjoy the boating at Naini Lake (At your own) & you can visit Mall Road for shopping.
Lake Tour Bhimtal, Naukuchia Tal, Sat Tal, Hanuman Temple, Golu Devta Temple at Gorhakhal.
Evening Nainital Sightseeing such as Nainia Devi Temple, Naini Lake, Tibetan Market, Raj Bhawan, St.John's Church, Land's End, Zoo Gardens, Snow View Point, Cave Garden, as per your time & comfort.

description.title: Day 3  Nainital to Corbett (145 Kms : 5–6Hrs. Travelling to Corbett)

subtitles.activities: Enroute visiting Ranikhet. Sightseeing of places in and around Ranikhet like Hairakhan Temple, Chaubatia and Bhaludam etc. later drive to Corbett National Park.
visit Corbett Museum and Garzia Devi Temple.

description.title: Day 4  Check Out from Corbett (230 Kms : 6-7Hrs. Travelling to Delhi)

subtitles.activities: Reaching at home by having Sweet Memoires in mind and lots of love.

importantInfo.title: Note
subtitles: Vehicles are not allowed on the Mall road of Nainital and Mussoorie so you have to travel by foot there.
AC and Music System in Vehicle will not be operated when we are on the Hilly Area.
All the rates are subject to change without prior notice.
All disputes are subject to Haridwar Jurisdiction.
Govt. Taxes (GST)
